prompt: List the files and folders in the current workspace and report the current working directory.
List the files and folders in the current workspace and report the current working directory.
Find all Python files in the workspace and list their paths so I know what code exists.
Read the README.md in the repo and give me a short summary of the setup steps.
Search the repository for TODO markers and summarize where they appear.
Look for config-like files such as *.json or *.yaml in the repo and list their locations for review.
Create a text file setup_notes.txt that lists the commands we should run to set up the project based on README.md.
Find any .log files in the workspace and show the last few lines of each to check for recent errors.
Use find to list the directories under the workspace root and write a brief textual summary of what you see.
Check the data folder (if it exists) and list its immediate contents so we know what inputs are available.
Find all Jupyter notebooks (*.ipynb) and report how many there are along with their paths.
